always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

chat_history.content:
## Day 1: March 12, 2022
### Travel
There are several flights you can take from Salt Lake City to Burbank on March 12th. Here are a few options:
- Flight F3846241 departing at 08:08, arriving at 09:03, with an actual elapsed time of 1 hour and 55 minutes.
- Flight F3846267 departing at 20:45, arriving at 21:40, also with an actual elapsed time of 1 hour and 55 minutes.
- Flight F3846293 departing at 15:29 and arriving at 16:21, with an actual elapsed time of 1 hour and 52 minutes.
- Flight F3851481 departing at 11:15, arriving at 12:03, taking 1 hour and 48 minutes.
- Flight F3972809 departing at 19:34 and arriving at 20:19, with an actual elapsed time of 1 hour and 45 minutes.

You could also drive to Burbank, which would take around 10 hours and cost approximately $55.

### Accommodations
For accommodations in Burbank, here are some options for entire rooms:
- A pleasant 1-bedroom apartment in Harlem Brownstone for $500, with a maximum occupancy of 5 people.
- A clean and quiet home on a quiet block for $1,143, sleeping up to 8 people.
- A Brooklyn 1-bedroom apartment for $583, suitable for 5 people.
- A cozy home in a great location for $1,098, with a maximum occupancy of 4.

### Dining
For dinner on the first night, you could try one of these restaurants in Burbank:
- Mellow Mushroom - serving tea, pizza, Mexican, fast food, cafe, and American cuisine with an average cost of $69.
- Tandoor Restaurant - specializing in tea, bakery, BBQ, and seafood, with an average cost of $78.
- Smaaash - offering pizza, bakery, BBQ, cafe, and Mediterranean dishes, priced at $39 on average.

## Day 2: March 13, 2022
### Attractions
On your second day, you could explore the following attractions in Burbank:
- Warner Bros. Studio Tour Hollywood - learn about the history of Warner Bros. and explore their studios.
- Burbank Aviation Museum - discover the history of aviation in Burbank and the surrounding areas.
- The Mystic Museum - an art museum with a unique collection of exhibits.
- Warner Bros. Water Tower - an iconic landmark in Burbank.
- Johnny Carson Park - a beautiful park with plenty of green space and recreational activities.
- Stough Canyon Park - a nature park with hiking trails and scenic views.
- Visit Burbank - an information center to learn more about the city and its attractions.

### Dining
For lunch, consider these dining options:
- Dawat-e-Nawab at Radisson Blu - serving Mexican, bakery, cafe, Indian, and seafood dishes for an average cost of $94.
- Hard Rock Cafe - offering desserts, tea, bakery, BBQ, Chinese, and Indian cuisine, with an average price of $33.
- Lucknow - Kingdom of Dreams - specializing in seafood, pizza, desserts, and Italian food, priced at $73 on average.
- Cafe Desire - serving bakery, desserts, and seafood, with an average cost of $52.

## Day 3: March 14, 2022
### Attractions
On your last day, you could visit:
- Gordon R Howard Museum - a local history museum.
- Martial Arts History Museum - dedicated to the history of martial arts.
- Batman: Hush Statue - a unique landmark for comic book and DC Comics fans.
- Portal of the Folded Wings Shrine to Aviation - another aviation-themed attraction.
- Abraham Lincoln Park - a city park with beautiful views.
- Stough Canyon Nature Center - offering educational programs and exhibits about nature.
- K1 Speed - an indoor go-karting venue for some team-building activities.

### Travel
For your return journey, you can choose a flight back to Salt Lake City. Here are some options:
- Flight F3846241 departing Burbank at 08:08, arriving in Salt Lake City at 09:03.
- Flight F3846267 departing at 20:45 and arriving at 21:40.
- Flight F3846293 departing at 15:29 and arriving at 16:21.
- Flight F3851481 departing at 11:15 and arriving at 12:03.
- Flight F3972809 departing at 19:34 and arriving at 20:19.

Alternatively, you could drive back to Salt Lake City, which would take approximately 10 hours.

Please note that the budget provided may not cover all expenses, especially if you choose the more expensive flight and accommodation options. It's recommended to review and adjust the plan based on your preferences and budget.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
